title: Ornoi
description: An ancient settlement, attested in written sources. Placed by C. Foss (Barrington Atlas) to the south of modern Ä°necik, Turkey. According to Hierokles, Ornoi was administratively located in the late province of Europe.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 24263
